title: 关于X 2 Earn应用的思考
body:
最近众多X 2 Earn应用在龙头STEPN爆火之后陆续产生，想在这里做一个小的总结和反思。

## X to earn形式分析

最最早期的当然还是Axie的玩游戏赚钱的老玩法，在经历了半年时间的众多游戏逐渐崩溃，或许我们可以得到一些反思。纯粹的玩游戏，并不能给玩家提供什么正向的外部性，再加上Web3游戏大多做的远不如Web2游戏的可玩性，最后就纯粹只是为了赚钱而来。

**个人认为好的x2e项目的x应该是一个正向性的x，是一个玩家坚持下去比较困难，有懒惰方面的阻力，但是玩家又希望坚持下去的好习惯**。比如我们在买健身卡之前期望的以后每天都去锻炼，报了英语课程之后期望的每天认真学习，买了书/Kindle以后坚持每天阅读等。那么对应在web3项目，或许就变成了每天跑步/运动/学英语/读书赚钱。从这个角度理解，这也是我个人不太认同一些其他的比如吃饭/玩游戏/唱歌/sex赚钱的理由，可能没有这个付费监督自己每天做这些事情的动机。所以或许不是所有事情，都是适合to earn的。

**由STEPN开启了move 2 Earn的新篇章**，还有很多从最开始的基本纯抄袭的跑步仿盘，到一些有的独特对战和探险属性的Move 2 Earn应用。其大多是靠陀螺仪+GPS的方式来捕捉运动，并有像STEPN类型的各种防作弊机制。实际陀螺仪+GPS的组合如果很好的加上服务器的数据分析，相对数据维度较少，可以比较容易识别作弊行为。但是个人认为其可拓展的形式会有点欠缺，主要通过分享经历，分享路线等方式，但是或许很少有听说有跑步直播的。

当然也有一些**泛运动类型赚钱的应用**陆续产生，由于泛运动属性支持的运动类型较为广泛，比如可以类似Keep支持各种动作姿势的室内运动，相对适用性也许会比跑步类应用更广泛。由于是室内运动，为了防作弊，其主要通过移动端的摄像头，对人体动作进行捕捉，并进行部分数学抽象来提取人体的运动。但是目前我体验过的一些应用，实际的算法可能还不够成熟，经常动作后没有捕捉到，体验不太好。不过理论上，这种技术不至于像自动驾驶一样难做，或许值得期待。目前因为还没有做的很大的这类型应用，不知道未来对于重放作弊是否能够有效检测预防。

对于**其他运动属性**，如骑自行车赚钱这种，个人感觉可能稍显牵强，由于**外部设备**的要求，可能并不能在很大范围传播。比如或许大多玩家会愿意花几百u买一双nft鞋子，但不会先几百u买一辆自行车，再花几百u买一辆nft自行车… 这或许也是健身环大冒险相比于舞力全开的销量少很多的原因之一（实际个人认为健身环大冒险的运动多样性和游戏度都比舞力全开要高不少）。

当然还不得不提到**学习赚钱**的形式。比如存活了好几个月的学英语赚钱Let Me Speak，还有最近慢慢兴起的一些读书赚钱。对于学英语赚钱，或许可以有比较好的检测机制，只需要设置一些任务和问题，回答正确以后即可获得奖励。但是我个人比较怀疑读书的检测方式，如果纯粹按时间或章节，实际很容易被模拟，也缺乏较好的检测机制。

一些其他的太离谱的，局限性可能都会非常大，在此不做讨论。

## 经济模型分析

其实不管是什么赚钱，可能整体的经济模型都大体类似。大多是通过购买NFT的方式，使用NFT完成某项任务，获得代币奖励。达到一定门槛（如升级）后，可以花费一定成本进行铸造，得到新的NFT。

### 生息资产的生命周期

**由于绝大多数游戏设计的NFT为无限期生息资产（生息资产无生命周期），生息资产的收益率无上限，实际经济会难以长期稳定**。先入场的玩家可以无限期的进行挖提卖的操作，若预期目标为经济的长期稳定（日收益率基本恒定），则如果没有后期玩家的指数型涌入，经济系统很难维持。

或许游戏可以引入各种博彩机制来增强游戏性，或引入一些X的正向外部性（如运动健康，学习等属性），来让部分入场玩家减缓对收益的实际关注，减缓经济系统的崩溃。但是不可忽略的一点是，只要预期的收益稳定且足够有诱惑力，便会有大量工作室涌入，只要雇佣的成本低于预期的收益，都可以有利可图。**如果大R（重氪）玩家的实际经济“亏损”+新入场玩家的购买，不足以对冲掉打金玩家恒定日收益率吸血+项目方对手续费的抽取，则经济系统走向衰退或许会成为必然**。

其实在我2个月之前，[关于STEPN的经济模型分析](https://mirror.xyz/0xpineapple.eth/Mrb0Yzj4DK0g_xQzaevKqMQ7YkrWDOVNZyjzyep7csQ)中就有提到一种可能的解法，**加入生息资产的生命周期**。比如就像汽车，随着汽车越来越老化，平均每年的维修成本也会越来越高，或者性能越来越差。随着净收益慢慢下降，对于大多数理性人，总会有一个时间点，汽车需要报废，因为买一辆新车的收益会大于继续用这辆旧车。这时候如果能够结合一些NFT的燃烧机制，就可以让玩家心甘情愿的把NFT烧掉，给另一个NFT升星/加属性，或者获得一点小奖励。

但如果生息资产生命周期无限，即使加入燃烧生息资产机制，燃烧NFT去加强另一个NFT的操作永远都是可以得到性价比计算的。如果算收益会赚，那么经济被吸血更多，如果算收益会亏，那么这种玩法还是主要属于大R，又回到了前面的循环。

那么加入生息资产的生命周期后，经济模型会变成什么样子？我简化一下模型，就假设每天鞋子净收益不变，生命周期结束直接报废（LMS的方法）。以STEPN的跑鞋为例，假如买一双鞋子后，生命周期是60天，不管你跑不跑，到时候都会报废。我们设置初始回本周期是40天，如果你每天满额运动，就可以净赚20天的钱。当然对于一些比较懒惰的玩家，像买健身卡一样，之后不想跑了，只运动了30天，那么就会亏10天的收益。如果懒惰的玩家的数量比勤奋玩家多很多，那么代币产出减少，自然代币价格提高更加有利于勤奋玩家的运动，回本会更快，反之亦然。**实际是在用懒惰玩家的钱去奖励勤奋玩家**。

当然以上只是个最最简单的模型，但是至少它能够解决经济模型中最大的问题。如果我们把这个模型的变量增加很多，加入更多STEPN提出过的脑洞玩法，加入各种概率/博彩机制等等，这个复杂的经济模型就更有可能良性自循环，并且不至于让NFT的数量通胀。拿少量的特殊NFT赋予无限生命周期的能力（如创世NFT），可以让初始玩家更显尊贵。

其实这种类型的经济模式在web2应用里面随处可见，比如我用过的像扇贝这种背单词软件，会有类似的年卡。如果一年打卡满多少天，会退款或赠送大礼包。其本质其实是类似的，只是Web3的to earn应用难以避免的会让大多数玩家在入局时计算回本时间并关心收益，这一点想要彻底解决在我玩了这么几个月看来，实在很难。

### x2e项目的预期收益率

另一个或许无关经济模型的要点是，**一个项目可能短期的2earn收益可以维持很高，或许可以多倍的远超代跑/代刷的收益，但是长期一定是不可持续的**。可以说几乎所有的x2e项目/链游，都难以防止工作室的进入。只要预期的收益足够高，大量的工作室就会蜂拥涌入，但几乎不管多么高级的防作弊系统，都不可能防止真人代刷的“作弊”方式，比如STEPN的代跑，LMS的代学英语，Axie的代刷。所以不管游戏中大R/氪金玩家能够创造多少经济“亏损”，理论上都可以被工作室的吸血效应抹平。**长期稳定的收益，最多只能是和代刷成本基本持平甚至更低**。就应了那句话，“最终我们都只是在赚份黑奴的钱”。

即使是对于大多数发展的不错的庞氏游戏（老用户赚新用户的钱），也都会经历成长期-成熟期-衰退期的过程。但是不得不说，**一个做的比较好的庞氏，在用户指数增长的成长期，赚钱效应大多会非常明显**。但一旦新增用户的增长曲线慢慢放缓，到达成熟期后，风险就会增大许多。由于新增用户放缓，在场内的日收益率慢慢降低中，总有某个时刻大户的抛盘没有被足够的新增玩家承接住，可能在很短时间就开始了螺旋下跌过程。如果早期入场的用户可以无限期的赚钱，难以避免其会不断进行挖提卖操作，造成场内价值持续流出。如果玩家对未来币价没有良好的预期，复投玩家和新入场玩家数都会减少，每天挖提卖造成的净流出持续，死亡螺旋将很难阻止。

不过对于生息资产有生命周期的项目（勤奋玩家赚懒惰玩家的钱），相对来说庞氏属性不很明显，即使到达成熟期新增用户放缓甚至停止新增，只要勤奋玩家和懒惰玩家的比例大致恒定，且预期收益基本不高于代刷成本，物价也可以在低位相对稳定。

当然以上的种种都只是分析和提出一些设想，想要让一个十万百万DAU的应用经济运转良好，势必要考虑太多的因素，也注定会是一个很复杂的系统。

但是有一点我个人坚持的是，**经济的慢慢衰退比大起大落让玩家相对更容易接受**。前者玩家可以选择比之前计算的更久时间回本或者小割肉出局，但后者可能会造成巅峰期的不少玩家被深套，回本无望，游戏体验过差，同时大量利润被投机者吃掉，不利于项目长期发展。因此项目方要在规则中保留一些宏观调控的权限，在经济出现大波动时，进行一些必要的干预。


---

决定一个链游能不能火的，更多的是游戏的产品，形式和潜在用户数量，但决定一个链游能火多久或活多久的，更多的就要看经济模型了。

title: One Smpl Trick
body:
9–5 metaverses and weekend metaverses, touch grass metaverses and [touch simulation](https://www.ft.com/content/4be5677b-bc03-4e46-bbbb-68074e8dda6c) metaverses, living metaverses and dying metaverses. With a hypnotic timbre, Mark Zuckerberg tells a story about the world to come that says everything there will be just as it is here. Just as our room is now, so it will be in the world to come; where our baby sleeps now, there too it will sleep in the other world. And the clothes we wear in this world, those too we will wear there. Everything will be as it is now, just differently textured.

The familiarity of variable-poly surfaces, however, belies the novel forms of visuality that animate the metaverse. Beyond the illusory layer of avatars and environments, techniques such as subtle gaze direction and foveated rendering exploit research on human visual cognition, while computer vision algorithms are refined by data synthesized using computer graphics. For humans, these new images operate below the threshold of perception; for machines, they provide the foundation of perception. Machine learning models trained on synthetic data, which is diverse and perfectly labeled by design, generalize better than models trained on real data, enabling avatars to represent users in granular detail.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Z0PeTXBZUBO9hyIKVK9T3.jpeg?height=883&width=1365&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&)

SMPLverse NFTs use facial recognition to retrieve data synthesized by Microsoft to train face tracking algorithms for its mixed reality headsets. Like many pfp projects, the Microsoft dataset uses procedural generation to randomly create and render faces without any manual intervention. The images combine a generative 3D face model with a library of artist-created assets—including textures, hair, and clothing—and SMPL, a body mesh used to animate avatars in virtual environments. Although verisimilitude is formally irrelevant to machine learning, it remains the only method of achieving functional equivalence between real and synthetic data.

Visually, the training images suggest identity play, emulating the avatars whose naturalism they are meant to enhance. Their effect, however, is to attune algorithms ever more precisely to users’ physical selves: the dataset expresses how users appear *to* virtual environments as much as how they appear *in* them. The minting process, which matches your own face to a smpl, elaborates the tension between freedom and constraint—even a pool of 100,000 images is too small to produce consistent matches.

The market-driven development of immersive technologies constitutes its own form of vision. By fractionalizing Microsoft’s dataset into NFTs, SMPLverse inverts its function, redistributing the metaverse’s centralized assets through its paradigmatic decentralized property form.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ua2pugKf_c16nk4xt8MhA.png?height=512&width=1024&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&)

### Details

* There are 511+2 tokens available to mint.
* Each token allows you to submit one image through our webcam interface. Your submitted image will be written to the token as a hash. Our facial recognition model uses this hash to match your image to a smpl.
* When the image is matched, it receives one attribute: confidence. Confidence assesses the likelihood that your image matches the smpl you receive. Confidence is a declining measure: as more smpls are matched, your likelihood of receiving a high confidence match decreases. Conversely, your likelihood of receiving a smpl with stranger visual attributes increases.
* 7 rare smpls have an additional “head pose cluster” attribute, which entitles them each to 4.14% of secondary revenue. These rare smpls form a group of images clustered by head pose. As more rare smpls are matched, the bounds of the cluster will sharpen. To acquire a rare smpl, token holders must recognize the same patterns that a facial recognition system trained on the dataset would be optimized to recognize.

### Starkware简介

StarkWare 主要解决了区块链的可扩展性和隐私。 StarkWare 开发了一个完整的解决方案，使用 STARK 技术，通过 zk-Rollups 和 Validium 模式组成 Volition 来生成和验证计算完整性的证明。 StarkWare 的密码证明可以做到零知识、简洁、透明和后量子安全。 StarkWare 所研发的产品主要有： StarkNet、StarkEx、Cairo。

### 主要特点

* 可拓展性：StarkWare 允许区块链通过依赖在云中的链下证明者生成的加密证明进行大规模扩展，然后通过链上智能合约进行验证。
* 隐私性：zk-STARK 证明不会透露输入的私人信息。 结合其他加密工具，zk-STARK 可以完全且可证明地保护用户数据。
* 用户体验：通过 **Immutable** 和 **dYdX** 的例子，我们就可以体验到 StarkWare 所提供方案极强的拓展能力。 DiversiFi 的支付 TPS 可以达到 18k，Immutable 的 NFT 铸造费用仅需 0.2 美分，dYdX 的交易费用缩减到了 1/50。秒确认，费率几乎为 0，带来了极佳的用户体验。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JGt_gTxMyqtiHRMZrNw3Y.png?height=968&width=1521)

### 投资机构青睐

*  2018 年 1 月，完成 种子轮600 万美元融资，参投方包括 MetaStable Capital 和 Foodgate、Pantera、Polychain、Zcash 以及 Vitalik Buterin；
* 2018年10月，3000 万美元B轮融资由 Paradigm 领投，英特尔创投、Sequoia、Atomico、丹华资本、Wing、ConsenSys、Coinbase Ventures、Multicoin Capital 等跟投；
* 2021年11月，它以估值20亿美元筹集了5000万美元的C轮融资，该轮融资由红杉资本领投，Paradigm、三箭资本、Alameda Research等知名加密风投机构参投；
* 2022年5月25日，以80亿美元估值完成了1亿美元的D轮融资，此轮融资由Greenoaks Capital、Tiger Global等机构领投，所筹资金将用于产品和业务开发及生态系统的发展。

### 为什么获得众多聪明钱的关注？

仅仅过去不到半年，其融资估值超4倍，是什么样的项目在熊市中依然这么亮眼？

这可能要归于它所提供的产品。众所周知，以太坊网络拥堵导致的Gas费过高一直是它的痛点，扩容成为一种解决方案，产生了两种路径：ZK Rollup和Optimistic rollup。

StarkWare选择了第一种，并在ZK Rollup采用的零知识证明算法的基础上，提出了升级版的「zkSTARK」算法，以增强区块链的可扩展性（也就是升级版的zk-rollup）。目前，在Layer2扩容方案中，ZK Rollup扩容方案的落地代表是StarkWare和zkSync，而Optimistic Rollup方案的代表是Arbitrum和Optimism。

大家都知道前段时间的op项目让早期参与者和深度互动者获得了大量空投，而且op对钱包的选择也非常严格，抛弃了大量的机器人账户和投机者。那怎样与尚在襁褓的starknet进行互动呢？那就是尽早参与提前进入其测试网络，和项目方亲密互动提出建议和意见，为项目助力。

之前写过一篇文章介绍了Arken Finance，现如今Arken又推出了不可伪造的空投（**NFA**），允许代币空投作为NFT进行铸造和交易，这是一种全新的空投模式，在众多同类型项目中也是少见的，下面我们来了解一下这种NFA究竟有何魅力

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HYpvgoA3ifiQggLBsBoHb.png?height=729&width=1400)

首先我们需要知道**NFA**究竟是一种怎么样的空投模式。要了解**NFA**，必须了解发放空投的概念。DeFi 中的空投是营销活动，当项目所有者或开发人员向个人发放免费代币时，通常用作产生对特定代币/代币的需求的一种方式，当他们在交易所上市时可能会物超所值。有了空投，似乎每个人都是赢家。但是，有时空投也有一些缺点。

首先，DeFi 项目经常不得不面对“空投猎人”。与真正的代币投资者或交易者看到每个项目的潜力不同，在大多数情况下，这些空投猎人一旦能够这样做，就会立即出售代币。这会对代币经济和代币价值产生不利影响。

**那什么是 NFA 及其背后的机制？**

NFA 或不可替代空投由 Arken Finance 首次引入，以代表 $ARKEN 空投奖励在初始 DEX 发行（IDO）之前的真实价值。引入 NFA 的目的是为*2000 名*第一次空投的获胜者解锁空投福利，并有机会在 $ARKEN IDO 之前交易他们的部分奖励。每个 **NFA** 对每个排名都是独特的，存储不同数量的 $ARKEN 代币以及他们的特权和好处。一旦未来推出代币，这些 **NFA** 的持有者将能够索取存储在该 NFA 上的 $ARKEN。（通俗点讲，每个**NFA**存储了$Arken代币在里面，我们在市场中购买了NFA，不单单可以获得NFT，还可以获得里面的代币，出售**NFA**的时候也是连着代币一起打包出售，这无形当中将NFA的价值大大提高，也提高了代币的流动性）

通过创新的模式，那我们购买或持有NFA到底有什么好处呢？

如果您是 Arken Finance 的 NFA 持有者之一，以下是拥有这些 **NFA** 的好处：

* 享受个性化的排他性：拥有您的限量版 Arken NFT Avatar（当您连接钱包时，这也将显示在 Arken Finance 上！）。
* 解锁空投第 2 轮特殊特权（不同的 NFA 在第 2 轮空投中将具有不同的特征和能力）。
* 享受 Arken Finance 未来高级功能的折扣和免费试用。
* 启动令牌后兑换 $ARKEN。NFA 将在赎回后销毁。

当然，持有NFA也可以在市场出售，NFA也给予了一定代币价值的预期，如果了解更多的官方信息，可以关注官方推特或者进TG或DC了解

title: DAOs, Blockchain and Beyond
body:
**Since 2019, I've been investing and building across the blockchain and DAO ecosystem. Here are some things I've learned:**

**Will power:** Many decentralized communities share a common vision and are willing to fund that vision. Determination is key to success.

**Doing good:** Many projects in the ecosystem are focused on leveraging blockchain and DeFi for creating positive socioeconomic value. Projects such as ACRE DAOs, Popcorn and DoinGud are great use cases. 

**Human Interaction:** In spite of all the good willed projects coming out of the ecosystem, most fail to encourage authentic person to person relationship building. You can’t discount the importance of human interaction and relationships. 

**Ethics:** Let’s be honest; this ecosystem is riddled with *degens* who are capitalizing on gamified structures to make themselves rich. I don't think cut-throat business practices have a place in Web3.

**Comprehensive Understanding of Business:** Sure, your engineers can code smart contracts. However, does your team have an understanding of the complex employment, IP, corporate and ethical legal framework where these contracts operate? The answer is usually no. This is an integral part in the process. Many DAOs and projects fall short, creating greater weight on the ecosystem as a whole. 

**Receptive to ideas and constructive criticism :** Communication and free exchange of ideas is positive for the community. Not being open to varying opinions and concepts is restrictive and inhibits growth.

**Government:** Many people in the ecosystem are complete anarchists. I'm in favor of working *with* governments to leverage the impact of blockchain innovation. 

**Tooling and Design:** How can we onboard the next billion users with fragmented tooling and non intuitive interfaces? The answer is that we can't. We need to focus on designing products so easy to use that even your grandma can participate in on-chain activities.

**Organization and Leadership :** One of the biggest drawbacks to DAOs in particular is lack of structure. Thousands of people in a Discord channel won't be as productive as 3 well aligned team members. DAOs need structure, organization and clear leadership in order to be successful within their communities and between their communities.

**Education:** When BrikPay was launched, we set out to be the first company to bring useful smart contracts to the residential construction industry. Our goal was to give both contractors and homeowners security during home renovation with a data powered escrow contract. We underestimate the amount of education needed to onboard contractors / builders and to help them understand the value of the technology. We also faced a lot of pushback; as many contractors did not want their records "on the books" for auditing.

The same is true for the ecosystem as it stands today. 

 My vision is a world where we can leverage blockchain innovation to make society more equitable and accessible to all. Though we have a long way to go, I remain a hopeful optimist. 

Pasquale J. Scaife

之前写过一篇文章介绍了Arken Finance，现如今Arken又推出了不可伪造的空投（**NFA**），允许代币空投作为NFT进行铸造和交易，这是一种全新的空投模式，在众多同类型项目中也是少见的，下面我们来了解一下这种NFA究竟有何魅力

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HYpvgoA3ifiQggLBsBoHb.png?height=729&width=1400)

首先我们需要知道**NFA**究竟是一种怎么样的空投模式。要了解**NFA**，必须了解发放空投的概念。DeFi 中的空投是营销活动，当项目所有者或开发人员向个人发放免费代币时，通常用作产生对特定代币/代币的需求的一种方式，当他们在交易所上市时可能会物超所值。有了空投，似乎每个人都是赢家。但是，有时空投也有一些缺点。

首先，DeFi 项目经常不得不面对“空投猎人”。与真正的代币投资者或交易者看到每个项目的潜力不同，在大多数情况下，这些空投猎人一旦能够这样做，就会立即出售代币。这会对代币经济和代币价值产生不利影响。

**那什么是 NFA 及其背后的机制？**

NFA 或不可替代空投由 Arken Finance 首次引入，以代表 $ARKEN 空投奖励在初始 DEX 发行（IDO）之前的真实价值。引入 NFA 的目的是为*2000 名*第一次空投的获胜者解锁空投福利，并有机会在 $ARKEN IDO 之前交易他们的部分奖励。每个 **NFA** 对每个排名都是独特的，存储不同数量的 $ARKEN 代币以及他们的特权和好处。一旦未来推出代币，这些 **NFA** 的持有者将能够索取存储在该 NFA 上的 $ARKEN。（通俗点讲，每个**NFA**存储了$Arken代币在里面，我们在市场中购买了NFA，不单单可以获得NFT，还可以获得里面的代币，出售**NFA**的时候也是连着代币一起打包出售，这无形当中将NFA的价值大大提高，也提高了代币的流动性）

通过创新的模式，那我们购买或持有NFA到底有什么好处呢？

如果您是 Arken Finance 的 NFA 持有者之一，以下是拥有这些 **NFA** 的好处：

* 享受个性化的排他性：拥有您的限量版 Arken NFT Avatar（当您连接钱包时，这也将显示在 Arken Finance 上！）。
* 解锁空投第 2 轮特殊特权（不同的 NFA 在第 2 轮空投中将具有不同的特征和能力）。
* 享受 Arken Finance 未来高级功能的折扣和免费试用。
* 启动令牌后兑换 $ARKEN。NFA 将在赎回后销毁。

当然，持有NFA也可以在市场出售，NFA也给予了一定代币价值的预期，如果了解更多的官方信息，可以关注官方推特或者进TG或DC了解

title: DickToadz FAQ
body:
## General Information

DickToadz is a community-driven project based on CryptoDickbutts and CrypToadz by Gremplin NFT projects.  As super-fans of the original projects, we set out to build an experience like no other: create your own DickToadz or Toadbutts by selecting all of your own custom layers.

DickToadz is a 5,200 sized collection for mint + 69 1/1 pieces for post-mint airdropping, making it a total 5,269 NFT collection.

## Mint Details

DickToadz will mint on 6.9.22 (June 9th, 2022) at 12PM NOON EST

From 12PM EST - 3PM EST, all CryptoDickbutt/CrypToadz by Gremplin/G.I. Toadz/Premint list will be able to mint.  After 3PM EST, we will open it up to a public mint.

This is to ensure our core communities and supporters have first chance to get this unique experience.

Mint price is 0.069ETH.

Mint limit will be 10 per wallet.

Upon minting, your NFT will be a ***BUILDER ACCESS PASS.***  This ***BUILDER ACCESS PASS*** can be redeemed in our DickToadz NFT builder on our website.

### The DickToadz NFT builder will be opened for use 48 HOURS after the mint on 6.9.22 and will remain open for exactly ONE MONTH after sell-out.

Once you create your NFT, the metadata of your builder access pass NFT will be replaced with your creation!

**IMPORTANT:**

Please only use official links from [@dicktoadz](https://twitter.com/dicktoadz) on Twitter and [www.dicktoadz.com](https://dicktoadz.com)

## Team

**[SuperTightWoody](https://twitter.com/supertightwoody)**

**[Kerimbonia](https://twitter.com/kerimbonia)**

**[TheOG](https://twitter.com/TheOG2233)**

**[Loaf](https://twitter.com/LoafinETH)**

**[Papaya](https://twitter.com/papaya3359)**

**[Klee](https://twitter.com/kIeebie)**

## Rarity

“Rarity” will be created as the project is minted based on layers that are selected by those who mint.

Our project’s approach is based on user experience.  We believe it’s important to leave the door open for user creativity rather than have a traditional rarity by limiting traits or favoring one NFT over the others.

## The Builder

The DickToadz NFT builder will be opened for use upon minting shortly after the mint on 6.9.22.  After selling the project out- we will be keeping the builder open for ONE MONTH.  Once this month has passed, we will be closing the builder.  We recommend that you build your NFT and not hold on to the passes!

## Duplicates

Visual duplicates CAN be created if people select the exact same layers during the minting process.   Out of the *QUADRILLIONS* of possibilities, we don’t think there will be duplicates and if so, very few.  But with the naming feature added to the builder, there will be no two DickToadz alike.

**WE  PLANNED FOR EXACTLY 2.557 QUADRILLION POSSIBLE COMBINATIONS.**

## Guest Artists/Contributors

**LuckCryptoCat, Pixelord, Mathcastles, Slowbro/Babby, Anas Abdin, BRKFST World, World of Noun, Van Coleman, CrypToadettez, Plant Frens, Pixel Shop (Sumiez), Pixel Portraits (Thom), Loosetooth, Shepard Vito, The Sheep +**

*Other NFT Projects we have in the builder:*

*Dead Fellas, Punks, Bored Apes, Doodles, Nifty League, Tiny Dinos, Kaiju Kings, Cyberkongz, Cool Cats, Alien Frens, GI Toadz, Goblintown, Tiny Dinos, Howlerz, The Jims, Larva Chads, Nouns, Cryptoskulls + more*

## Donations

As builders and community members of both CryptoDickbutts and CrypToadz by Gremplin, we will be donating 20ETH to each of these treasuries post-sell out of DickToadz.

We believe that pushing the envelope by **creating** will both further the value proposition of the original collections, along with helping fund any future initiatives that can help our communities grow.

## The Feeding + Bounty Hunting

Gremp Corp. is keeping Gremplin\*\*\* alive by **feeding** him DickToadz.  Gremp Corp.’s leader, FronkBot, creates a menu with certain “styles” or “tastes”.  The feeding will be an airdrop mechanism where the DickToadz or Toadbutts that are created with these certain traits will be narrowed down and selected by Fronkbot for a special prize.

**POST SELL OUT**, our prizes for the feeding will include: 1/1 art from guest artists and core team, “licked” DickToadz, 1 Cryptodickbutt, 1 CrypToadz and various amounts of ETH.

Bounty hunting will be a post-mint menu where Gremp Corp will select a random category and people can build or “bounty hunt” DickToadz on OpenSea to hold what Gremplin\*\*\* is wanting to eat. These same prizes will turn over to the bounty hunting once the project is minted out.

\*\*\* *Gremplin the artist is not associated with this project.  We are using his name and likeness from the original CrypToadz by Gremplin NFT collection to continue the lore story.*

![Let the feeding begin...](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/smZRGVYfC1SiH-XsceNiz.png?height=500&width=1500)

## DickToadz Lore Story

Amidst the great war, remaining survivors of the **Dickbutts** and **Cryptoadz** attempt to escape **Gooch Island** and instead are thrust into the future of 6969, this is their story...

The year is 2022, the oppression of the Dickbutts and the Cryptoadz on Gooch Island has wreaked havoc on the landscape and its inhabitants since inception. Evil forces work to capture Cryptoadz while Dickbutts are forced to flee and find refuge elsewhere. Months go by, and slowly but surely, years at a time. What’s left of the population on Gooch Island is scarce and scattered. Fortunately, but unfortunately for some, they have evaded capture yet remain on the island in hiding with little to keep them going. It isn't until a small group of Butts and Toadz find each other and unite in a desperate effort to escape, which brings us to the present.

![Gremp Corp Bunker](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CNp5vLZsSaE9ZPjNKPeok.png?height=1080&width=1920)

Whilst moving between established safe zones, the newly formed group stumbles upon what they can only assume is a bunker. Upon closer inspection it would appear to be abandoned, giving them the opportunity to pillage it briefly for resources that might help their cause. When entering, they quickly realize it is actually some sort of laboratory. Dormant machinery sits idle among the room, however, one very large looking computer occupies the center along with several tubes and a large empty metallic ring.

As they approach the equipment they see paperwork with illegible text, pictures of the self proclaimed Evil King of Gooch island, and a single, solitary jar… with a pickle. They know not what they are looking at yet they start to discuss how this could be their way off this dreaded island, if only they knew how to operate it. After some time and deliberation, the group decides this is their one chance to make something, if anything, happen in their favor and thus they begin to scour the machine of its many sockets and switches. After several minutes of haphazardly pressing buttons, flipping switches, and barbarically hammering the machine with blunt objects, they notice a hole with odd markings around it. In a last effort to get anything at all to happen, they decide to do the weirdest thing they can think of and insert the pickle…  The machine begins vibrating and whirring violently. The computer hums to life, releasing a cavalcade of beeps and chirps, the tubes at the side bubble vigorously, and finally, to the awe of everyone in the room, the metallic ring starts to form some kind of violet and black matter akin to that of space, until it completely fills the inner circle.

![Enter: The Lab](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-hYVmv0h7tz5-wehknIyt.png?height=1520&width=2160)

With the pickle in hand, the newfound key to their success, both CrypToadz and Dickbutts approach the freshly created portal. Hesitant at first, and weary about diving head first into the unknown, they look at one another with an understanding that anything is better than their current situation. This portal must go somewhere better, more inhabitable, safe from the terrors of Gremplin’s horde. It MUST be… Right?

Before another thought could cross their tiny minds the portal begins to draw them in like that of a tractorbeam. They have no choice now, either stay and perish with the rest of Gooch Island, or risk everything for a better tomorrow. With that, they enter the swirling door to the unknown.

![Time traveling !vibez](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/V2vzLuDBaiAl_nIcDpp7V.png?height=940&width=1676)

Within an instant, the last survivors of Gooch Island disappear from the room, sucked into the abyss, along with their trusty pickle… followed by a picture of Gremplin, the lab, the secret bunker and eventually all of Gooch island. The portal was unstable, the machine was breaking, this was a one way trip and it was more than just the Toadz and Dickbutts in tow.

As unnatural a situation as it was, still more issues arose. While tunneling to their unknown destination, the DNA of all that went through the portal (animate and inanimate) became scrambled with other random objects from Gooch Island and whatever else they crossed in the tunnel, past and present! The situation was CC0ut of control, and when they reached the other side, they were met with a disappointing sight. These new beings appeared not in a new location, no, they were on Gooch Island... a bleak and desolate place where Gremp Corp. ruled the land... in the year 6969…

![There is no going back...or...IS there?  ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wCgU749cNxed6wIKxHobj.png?height=612&width=1090)

A dystopian city lay before our survivors, who stood in the shadow of a looming skyscraper that read “**GREMP CORP”** in bright neon lights. They find themselves in an even worse circumstance than the one they were fleeing.  Now, they have no choice- they must work together to survive in this new world. One of them in particular looks around at his people and starts to speak, making it clear that he will not let them be oppressed any longer. They look back at him, not knowing what his name is or was, they start chanting his new callsign… PICKLE, PICKLE! Now looking to one another they understand they are no longer who they once were prior to portaling. They were a ***new breed***, one that combined culture and vibes, with a new opportunity to stop the evil king and his now established empire, they were, the ***DICKTOADZ!***

Little do they know, the decrepit Gremplin is desperate to find a new source of sustenance in his weakened state, and his henchmen know just what he wants to feed on…
